items.sentence: We saw several police cars with sirens blaring and lights flashing racing down the road.
Tom asked me which of my children I liked best. I told him that I like them all equally.

The advantage of old age is that you no longer want what you previously couldn't afford.
Some months have thirty-one days, others have thirty and one month has less than thirty.
In France, advertising of mobile phones directed at children 12 and under is prohibited.
Tom didn't know that Mary thought that he should invite John and Alice to their wedding.
When Mary went to cook dinner, she found that her potatoes had sprouted in the cupboard.

Tom and Mary haven't talked to each other for a month now because of a misunderstanding.
